content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4.31 - Executive Order No. 31: Directing that the Chief of Staff to the Governor order into active service the organized militia to assist civil agencies and authorities in the City of Buffalo in disaster recovery efforts. [*][DAGGER]
State Regulations
I, Mario M. Cuomo, by virtue of the authority vested in me
as Governor, under the Military Law of the State, do herby direct by executive
order that the Chief of Staff to the Governor order into the active service of
the State, for such period, to such extent, and in such manner as he may deem
necessary, all or any part of the organized militia to assist civil agencies
and authorities in the City of Buffalo in disaster recovery efforts
necessitated by the destruction caused by an explosion in that City on December
27, 1983. 1. Major General Vito J. Castellano, Chief of Staff to the Governor, is hereby appointed commander of
all personnel ordered into the active service of the State. 2. Units and members of the organized militia
who shall perform State active duty by order of the Chief of Staff to the

Governor will immediately assemble at their local armories when so ordered, and
will remain assembled pending further orders as to their disposition by the

Chief of Staff to the Governor. All enlistments, reenlistments or voluntary extension of
enlistments which expire after December 29, 1983, and during the period for
which the members are currently ordered into the active service of the State
are hereby extended for the duration of such duty in the active service of the

State. Signed: Mario M. Cuomo

Dated: December 29, 1983
PROCLAMATION
WHEREAS, the Governor is Commander-in-Chief of the Militia
of the State, pursuant to the Constitution of the State, as restated in Section
3
of the Military

Law; and
WHEREAS, pursuant to the provisions of Section
6
of the Military

Law, the Governor as Commander-in-Chief of the Militia, has the power to order
into the active service of the State in case of disaster or imminent danger
thereof such units of the organized militia which may be necessary to assist
civil authorities in disaster recovery efforts; and
WHEREAS, an explosion in the City of Buffalo, Erie County, has caused widespread destruction in that City; and
WHEREAS, the City of Buffalo requires assistance from the
organized militia and the public interest requires such action at the State
level to provide assistance in recovery efforts in the aftermath of the
explosion; NOW, THEREFORE, I, Mario M. Cuomo, Governor of the State of

New York, pursuant to the authority vested in me by paragraph one of section
6
of the Military

Law, have this day, by executive order, ordered Major General Vito J. Castellano, Chief of Staff to the Governor, to order into the active service of
the State, for such period, to such extent and in such manner as he may deem
necessary, all or any part of the organized militia to meet this
emergency. Signed: Mario M. Cuomo

Dated: December 29, 1983
